txt.en: \qThe Path Less Trod\q is said to be a narrative detailing the author's travels with the Rohirrim. In it, he supposedly describes their martial prowess with spears.

You have heard it whispered that the libraries of Moria yet contain many tomes, while many other volumes were brought by the dwarves seeking to reclaim their ancient realm. One such tome in the libraries of the Iron Garrison is said to be the legendary \qThe Path Less Trod.\q If you can gain enough favour with the Iron Garrison Guards, they may let you have their copy of this book.
Read the book, \qThe Path Less Trod\q
